author: The Associated Press
title: What you need to know today about the virus outbreak
description: President Donald Trump is pressing to restart the U.S. economy, which has been ravaged by the pandemic in a short few weeks
content:
President Donald Trump is pressing to restart the U.S. economy, which has been ravaged by the pandemic in a short few weeks. 
He has given U.S. governors a road map for recovering from the acute economic pain, laying out a phased approach to restoring normal… [+3880 chars]
